00041 #define HT_DEBUG_ATTR(_txn_, _fn_, _an_, _k_, _v_) \
00042   HT_DEBUG_OUT <<"txn="<< (_txn_) <<" fname='"<< (_fn_) <<"' attr='"<< (_an_) \
00043       <<"' key='"<< (char *)(_k_).get_data() <<"' value='"<< (_v_) <<"'" \
00044       << HT_END
00045 
00046 #define HT_DEBUG_ATTR_(_txn_, _fn_, _an_, _k_, _v_, _l_) \
00047   HT_DEBUG_OUT <<"txn="<< (_txn_) <<" fname='"<< (_fn_); \
00048   if ((_an_) == String()) _out_ <<"' attr='"<< (_an_); \
00049   _out_ <<"' key='" << (char *)(_k_).get_data(); \
00050   if (_l_) _out_ <<"' value='"<< format_bytes(20, _v_, _l_); \
00051   _out_ <<"'"<< HT_END

00055 BerkeleyDbFilesystem::BerkeleyDbFilesystem(const std::string &basedir,
00056                                            bool force_recover)
00057     : m_base_dir(basedir), m_env(0) {
00058   DbTxn *txn = NULL;
00059 
00060   u_int32_t env_flags =
00061     DB_CREATE |      // If the environment does not exist, create it
00062     DB_INIT_LOCK  |  // Initialize locking
00063     DB_INIT_LOG   |  // Initialize logging
00064     DB_INIT_MPOOL |  // Initialize the cache
00065     DB_INIT_TXN   |  // Initialize transactions
00066     DB_RECOVER    |  // Do basic recovery
00067     DB_THREAD;
00068 
00069   if (force_recover)
00070     env_flags |= DB_RECOVER_FATAL;
00071 
00072   u_int32_t db_flags = DB_CREATE | DB_AUTO_COMMIT | DB_THREAD;
00073 
00077   try {
00078     int ret;
00079     Dbt key, data;
00080 
00081     m_env.set_lk_detect(DB_LOCK_DEFAULT);
00082 
00083     m_env.open(m_base_dir.c_str(), env_flags, 0);
00084     m_db = new Db(&m_env, 0);
00085     m_db->open(NULL, "namespace.db", NULL, DB_BTREE, db_flags, 0);
00086 
00087     txn = start_transaction();
00088 
00089     key.set_data((void *)"/");
00090     key.set_size(2);
00091 
00092     data.set_flags(DB_DBT_REALLOC);
00093 
00094     if ((ret = m_db->get(txn, &key, &data, 0)) == DB_NOTFOUND) {
00095       data.set_data(0);
00096       data.set_size(0);
00097       ret = m_db->put(txn, &key, &data, 0);
00098       key.set_data((void *)"/hyperspace/");
00099       key.set_size(strlen("/hyperspace/")+1);
00100       ret = m_db->put(txn, &key, &data, 0);
00101       key.set_data((void *)"/hyperspace/metadata");
00102       key.set_size(strlen("/hyperspace/metadata")+1);
00103       ret = m_db->put(txn, &key, &data, 0);
00104     }
00105     if (data.get_data() != 0)
00106       free(data.get_data());
00107     txn->commit(0);
00108 
00109   }
00110   catch(DbException &e) {
00111     txn->abort();
00112     HT_FATALF("Error initializing Berkeley DB (dir=%s) - %s",
00113               m_base_dir.c_str(), e.what());
00114   }
00115   HT_DEBUG_OUT <<"namespace initialized"<< HT_END;
00116 }
00117 
00118 
00121 BerkeleyDbFilesystem::~BerkeleyDbFilesystem() {
00125   try {
00126     m_db->close(0);
00127     delete m_db;
00128     m_env.close(0);
00129   }
00130   catch(DbException &e) {
00131     HT_ERRORF("Error closing Berkeley DB (dir=%s) - %s",
00132               m_base_dir.c_str(), e.what());
00133   }
00134   HT_DEBUG_OUT <<"namespace closed"<< HT_END;
00135 }

00137 
00138 DbTxn *BerkeleyDbFilesystem::start_transaction() {
00139   DbTxn *txn = NULL;
00140 
00141   // begin transaction
00142   try {
00143     m_env.txn_begin(NULL, &txn, DB_READ_COMMITTED);
00144   }
00145   catch (DbException &e) {
00146     HT_FATALF("Error starting Berkeley DB transaction: %s", e.what());
00147   }
00148   HT_DEBUG_OUT <<"txn="<< txn << HT_END;
00149 
00150   return txn;
00151 }

00153 
00156 bool
00157 BerkeleyDbFilesystem::get_xattr_i32(DbTxn *txn, const String &fname,
00158     const String &aname, uint32_t *valuep) {
00159   int ret;
00160   Dbt key;
00161   DbtManaged data;
00162   String keystr = fname;
00163 
00164   build_attr_key(txn, keystr, aname, key);
00165 
00166   try {
00167     if ((ret = m_db->get(txn, &key, &data, 0)) == 0) {
00168       *valuep = strtoll((const char *)data.get_data(), 0, 0);
00169       HT_DEBUG_ATTR(txn, fname, aname, key, *valuep);
00170       return true;
00171     }
00172   }
00173   catch (DbException &e) {
00174     HT_ERRORF("Berkeley DB error: %s", e.what());
00175     if (e.get_errno() == DB_LOCK_DEADLOCK)
00176       HT_THROW(HYPERSPACE_BERKELEYDB_DEADLOCK, e.what());
00177     else
00178       HT_THROW(HYPERSPACE_BERKELEYDB_ERROR, e.what());
00179   }
00180 
00181   return false;
00182 }

00185 
00188 void
00189 BerkeleyDbFilesystem::set_xattr_i32(DbTxn *txn, const String &fname,
00190                                     const String &aname, uint32_t value) {
00191   int ret;
00192   Dbt key, data;
00193   char numbuf[16];
00194   String keystr = fname;
00195 
00196   build_attr_key(txn, keystr, aname, key);
00197 
00198   sprintf(numbuf, "%u", value);
00199 
00200   data.set_data(numbuf);
00201   data.set_size(strlen(numbuf)+1);
00202 
00203   try {
00204     ret = m_db->put(txn, &key, &data, 0);
00205     HT_DEBUG_ATTR(txn, fname, aname, key, value);
00206   }
00207   catch (DbException &e) {
00208     HT_ERRORF("Berkeley DB error: %s", e.what());
00209     if (e.get_errno() == DB_LOCK_DEADLOCK)
00210       HT_THROW(HYPERSPACE_BERKELEYDB_DEADLOCK, e.what());
00211     else
00212       HT_THROW(HYPERSPACE_BERKELEYDB_ERROR, e.what());
00213   }
00214 
00215   HT_EXPECT(ret == 0, HYPERSPACE_BERKELEYDB_ERROR);
00216 }

00315 bool
00316 BerkeleyDbFilesystem::get_xattr(DbTxn *txn, const String &fname,
00317                                 const String &aname, DynamicBuffer &vbuf) {
00318   int ret;
00319   Dbt key;
00320   DbtManaged data;
00321   String keystr = fname;
00322 
00323   build_attr_key(txn, keystr, aname, key);
00324 
00325   try {
00326     if ((ret = m_db->get(txn, &key, &data, 0)) == 0) {
00327       vbuf.reserve(data.get_size());
00328       memcpy(vbuf.base, (uint8_t *)data.get_data(), data.get_size());
00329       vbuf.ptr += data.get_size();
00330       HT_DEBUG_ATTR_(txn, fname, aname, key, vbuf.base, data.get_size());
00331       return true;
00332     }
00333   }
00334   catch (DbException &e) {
00335     HT_ERRORF("Berkeley DB error: %s", e.what());
00336     if (e.get_errno() == DB_LOCK_DEADLOCK)
00337       HT_THROW(HYPERSPACE_BERKELEYDB_DEADLOCK, e.what());
00338     else
00339       HT_THROW(HYPERSPACE_BERKELEYDB_ERROR, e.what());
00340   }
00341 
00342   return false;
00343 }

00346 void
00347 BerkeleyDbFilesystem::del_xattr(DbTxn *txn, const String &fname,
00348                                 const String &aname) {
00349   int ret;
00350   Dbt key;
00351   String keystr = fname;
00352 
00353   build_attr_key(txn, keystr, aname, key);
00354 
00355   try {
00356     if ((ret = m_db->del(txn, &key, 0)) == DB_NOTFOUND)
00357       HT_THROW(HYPERSPACE_ATTR_NOT_FOUND, aname);
00358     HT_DEBUG_ATTR_(txn, fname, aname, key, "", 0);
00359   }
00360   catch (DbException &e) {
00361     HT_ERRORF("Berkeley DB error: %s", e.what());
00362     if (e.get_errno() == DB_LOCK_DEADLOCK)
00363       HT_THROW(HYPERSPACE_BERKELEYDB_DEADLOCK, e.what());
00364     else
00365       HT_THROW(HYPERSPACE_BERKELEYDB_ERROR, e.what());
00366   }
00367 }

00369 
00372 void BerkeleyDbFilesystem::mkdir(DbTxn *txn, const String &name) {
00373   int ret;
00374   Dbt key;
00375   DbtManaged data;
00376   size_t lastslash = name.rfind('/', name.length()-1);
00377   String dirname = name.substr(0, lastslash+1);
00378 
00379   try {
00383     key.set_data((void *)dirname.c_str());
00384     key.set_size(dirname.length()+1);
00385 
00386     if ((ret = m_db->get(txn, &key, &data, 0)) == DB_NOTFOUND)
00387       HT_THROW(HYPERSPACE_FILE_NOT_FOUND, dirname);
00388 
00389     // formulate directory name
00390     dirname = name;
00391     if (dirname[dirname.length()-1] != '/')
00392       dirname += "/";
00393 
00394     HT_DEBUG_OUT <<"dirname='"<< dirname <<"'"<< HT_END;
00395 
00399     key.set_data((void *)dirname.c_str());
00400     key.set_size(dirname.length()+1);
00401 
00402     if ((ret = m_db->get(txn, &key, &data, 0)) != DB_NOTFOUND)
00403       HT_THROW(HYPERSPACE_FILE_EXISTS, dirname);
00404 
00408     key.set_data((void *)dirname.c_str());
00409     key.set_size(dirname.length()+1);
00410 
00411     data.clear();
00412 
00413     ret = m_db->put(txn, &key, &data, 0);
00414 
00415   }
00416   catch (DbException &e) {
00417     HT_ERRORF("Berkeley DB error: %s", e.what());
00418     if (e.get_errno() == DB_LOCK_DEADLOCK)
00419       HT_THROW(HYPERSPACE_BERKELEYDB_DEADLOCK, e.what());
00420     else
00421       HT_THROW(HYPERSPACE_BERKELEYDB_ERROR, e.what());
00422   }
00423 }
00424 
00425 
00426 void BerkeleyDbFilesystem::unlink(DbTxn *txn, const String &name) {
00427   std::vector<String> delkeys;
00428   DbtManaged keym, datam;
00429   Dbt key;
00430   Dbc *cursorp = 0;
00431   bool looks_like_dir = false;
00432   bool looks_like_file = false;
00433   String str;
00434 
00435   try {
00436     m_db->cursor(txn, &cursorp, 0);
00437 
00438     keym.set_str(name);
00439 
00440     if (cursorp->get(&keym, &datam, DB_SET_RANGE) != DB_NOTFOUND) {
00441       do {
00442         str = keym.get_str();
00443 
00444         if (str.length() > name.length()) {
00445           if (str[name.length()] == '/') {
00446             if (str.length() > name.length() + 1
00447                 && str[name.length() + 1] != NODE_ATTR_DELIM) {
00448               cursorp->close();
00449               HT_THROW(HYPERSPACE_DIR_NOT_EMPTY, name);
00450             }
00451             looks_like_dir = true;
00452             delkeys.push_back(keym.get_str());
00453           }
00454           else if (str[name.length()] == NODE_ATTR_DELIM) {
00455             looks_like_file = true;
00456             delkeys.push_back(keym.get_str());
00457           }
00458         }
00459         else {
00460           delkeys.push_back(keym.get_str());
00461           looks_like_file = true;
00462         }
00463 
00464       } while (cursorp->get(&keym, &datam, DB_NEXT) != DB_NOTFOUND &&
00465                starts_with(keym.get_str(), name.c_str()));
00466     }
00467 
00468     cursorp->close();
00469     cursorp = 0;
00470 
00471     HT_ASSERT(!(looks_like_dir && looks_like_file));
00472 
00473     if (delkeys.empty())
00474       HT_THROW(HYPERSPACE_FILE_NOT_FOUND, name);
00475 
00476     for (size_t i=0; i<delkeys.size(); i++) {
00477       key.set_data((void *)delkeys[i].c_str());
00478       key.set_size(delkeys[i].length()+1);
00479       HT_ASSERT(m_db->del(txn, &key, 0) != DB_NOTFOUND);
00480       HT_DEBUG_ATTR_(txn, name, "", key, "", 0);
00481     }
00482   }
00483   catch (DbException &e) {
00484     HT_ERRORF("Berkeley DB error: %s", e.what());
00485     if (cursorp)
00486       cursorp->close();
00487     if (e.get_errno() == DB_LOCK_DEADLOCK)
00488       HT_THROW(HYPERSPACE_BERKELEYDB_DEADLOCK, e.what());
00489     else
00490       HT_THROW(HYPERSPACE_BERKELEYDB_ERROR, e.what());
00491   }
00492 }
00493 
00494 
00495 bool
00496 BerkeleyDbFilesystem::exists(DbTxn *txn, String fname, bool *is_dir_p) {
00497   int ret;
00498   Dbt key;
00499 
00500   if (is_dir_p)
00501     *is_dir_p = false;
00502 
00503   key.set_data((void *)fname.c_str());
00504   key.set_size(fname.length()+1);
00505 
00506   try {
00507     if ((ret = m_db->exists(txn, &key, 0)) == DB_NOTFOUND) {
00508       fname += "/";
00509       key.set_data((void *)fname.c_str());
00510       key.set_size(fname.length()+1);
00511 
00512       if ((ret = m_db->exists(txn, &key, 0)) == DB_NOTFOUND) {
00513         HT_DEBUG_OUT <<"'"<< fname <<"' does NOT exist."<< HT_END;
00514         return false;
00515       }
00516       if (is_dir_p)
00517         *is_dir_p = true;
00518     }
00519   }
00520   catch (DbException &e) {
00521     HT_ERRORF("Berkeley DB error: %s", e.what());
00522      if (e.get_errno() == DB_LOCK_DEADLOCK)
00523       HT_THROW(HYPERSPACE_BERKELEYDB_DEADLOCK, e.what());
00524     else
00525       HT_THROW(HYPERSPACE_BERKELEYDB_ERROR, e.what());
00526   }
00527 
00528   HT_DEBUG_OUT <<"'"<< fname <<"' exists."<< HT_END;
00529   return true;
00530 }

00532 
00536 void
00537 BerkeleyDbFilesystem::create(DbTxn *txn, const String &fname, bool temp) {
00538   int ret;
00539   Dbt key;
00540   DbtManaged data;
00541 
00542   HT_DEBUG_OUT <<"txn="<< txn <<" fname='"<< fname <<"' temp="<< temp << HT_END;
00543 
00544   try {
00545     if (exists(txn, fname, 0))
00546       HT_THROW(HYPERSPACE_FILE_EXISTS, fname);
00547 
00548     if (ends_with(fname, "/"))
00549       HT_THROW(HYPERSPACE_IS_DIRECTORY, fname);
00550 
00551     size_t lastslash = fname.rfind('/', fname.length() - 1);
00552     String parent_dir = fname.substr(0, lastslash + 1);
00553 
00554     key.set_data((void *)parent_dir.c_str());
00555     key.set_size(parent_dir.length()+1);
00556 
00557     if ((ret = m_db->get(txn, &key, &data, 0)) == DB_NOTFOUND)
00558       HT_THROW(HYPERSPACE_BAD_PATHNAME, fname);
00559 
00560     key.set_data((void *)fname.c_str());
00561     key.set_size(fname.length()+1);
00562 
00563     ret = m_db->put(txn, &key, &data, 0);
00564 
00565     if (temp) {
00566       String temp_key = fname + NODE_ATTR_DELIM +"temp";
00567       key.set_data((void *)temp_key.c_str());
00568       key.set_size(temp_key.length()+1);
00569       ret = m_db->put(txn, &key, &data, 0);
00570     }
00571   }
00572   catch (DbException &e) {
00573     HT_ERRORF("Berkeley DB error: %s", e.what());
00574      if (e.get_errno() == DB_LOCK_DEADLOCK)
00575       HT_THROW(HYPERSPACE_BERKELEYDB_DEADLOCK, e.what());
00576     else
00577       HT_THROW(HYPERSPACE_BERKELEYDB_ERROR, e.what());
00578    }
00579 }
00580 
00581 
00582 void
00583 BerkeleyDbFilesystem::get_directory_listing(DbTxn *txn, String fname,
00584                                             std::vector<DirEntry> &listing) {
00585   DbtManaged keym, datam;
00586   Dbt key;
00587   Dbc *cursorp = 0;
00588   String str, last_str;
00589   DirEntry entry;
00590   size_t offset;
00591 
00592   try {
00593     m_db->cursor(txn, &cursorp, 0);
00594 
00595     if (!ends_with(fname, "/"))
00596       fname += "/";
00597 
00598     HT_DEBUG_OUT <<"txn="<< txn <<" dir='"<< fname <<"'"<< HT_END;
00599     keym.set_str(fname);
00600 
00601     if (cursorp->get(&keym, &datam, DB_SET_RANGE) != DB_NOTFOUND) {
00602 
00603       if (!starts_with(keym.get_str(), fname.c_str())) {
00604         cursorp->close();
00605         HT_THROW(HYPERSPACE_BAD_PATHNAME, fname);
00606       }
00607 
00608       do {
00609         str = keym.get_str();
00610 
00611         if (str.length() > fname.length()) {
00612           if (str[fname.length()] != NODE_ATTR_DELIM ) {
00613             str = str.substr(fname.length());
00614 
00615             if ((offset = str.find('/')) != String::npos) {
00616               entry.name = str.substr(0, offset);
00617 
00618               if (entry.name != last_str) {
00619                 entry.is_dir = true;
00620                 listing.push_back(entry);
00621                 last_str = entry.name;
00622               }
00623             }
00624             else {
00625               if ((offset = str.find(NODE_ATTR_DELIM)) != String::npos) {
00626                 entry.name = str.substr(0, offset);
00627 
00628                 if (entry.name != last_str) {
00629                   entry.is_dir = false;
00630                   listing.push_back(entry);
00631                   last_str = entry.name;
00632                 }
00633               }
00634               else {
00635                 entry.name = str;
00636 
00637                 if (entry.name != last_str) {
00638                   entry.is_dir = false;
00639                   listing.push_back(entry);
00640                   last_str = entry.name;
00641                 }
00642               }
00643             }
00644           }
00645         }
00646       } while (cursorp->get(&keym, &datam, DB_NEXT) != DB_NOTFOUND &&
00647                starts_with(keym.get_str(), fname.c_str()));
00648 
00649     }
00650 
00651     cursorp->close();
00652     cursorp = 0;
00653 
00654   }
00655   catch (DbException &e) {
00656     HT_ERRORF("Berkeley DB error: %s", e.what());
00657     if (cursorp)
00658       cursorp->close();
00659     if (e.get_errno() == DB_LOCK_DEADLOCK)
00660       HT_THROW(HYPERSPACE_BERKELEYDB_DEADLOCK, e.what());
00661     else
00662       HT_THROW(HYPERSPACE_BERKELEYDB_ERROR, e.what());
00663    }
00664 }
00665 
00666 
00667 void
00668 BerkeleyDbFilesystem::get_all_names(DbTxn *txn,
00669                                     std::vector<String> &names) {
00670   DbtManaged keym, datam;
00671   Dbc *cursorp = NULL;
00672   int ret;
00673 
00674   HT_DEBUG_OUT <<"txn="<< txn << HT_END;
00675 
00676   try {
00677     m_db->cursor(txn, &cursorp, 0);
00678 
00679     while ((ret = cursorp->get(&keym, &datam, DB_NEXT)) == 0) {
00680       names.push_back(keym.get_str());
00681     }
00682   }
00683   catch(DbException &e) {
00684     HT_FATALF("Berkeley DB error: %s", e.what());
00685   }
00686   catch(std::exception &e) {
00687     HT_FATALF("Berkeley DB error: %s", e.what());
00688   }
00689 
00690   if (cursorp != NULL)
00691     cursorp->close();
00692 }
00693 
00694 void
00695 BerkeleyDbFilesystem::build_attr_key(DbTxn *txn, String &keystr,
00696                                      const String &aname, Dbt &key) {
00697   bool isdir;
00698 
00699   if (!exists(txn, keystr, &isdir))
00700     HT_THROW(HYPERSPACE_FILE_NOT_FOUND, keystr);
00701 
00702   if (isdir)
00703     keystr += "/";
00704 
00705   keystr += NODE_ATTR_DELIM;
00706   keystr += aname;
00707 
00708   key.set_data((void *)keystr.c_str());
00709   key.set_size(keystr.length() + 1);
00710 }
